rmi.client.events

Class ClientGameEventController

  • java.lang.Object
    • rmi.client.events.ClientGameEventController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IClientGameEventListener

    public final class ClientGameEventController
extends java.lang.Object
implements IClientGameEventListener
    an observable controller that exposes all events fired by server
    Author:
    rverbist
